title: I have an idea
body: I was thinking about the loot system today and I think I'm onto something here. A ton of people have all the champions in the game and really nothing else to do with blue essence, so champ shards to them are worthless. They have 100k+ BE and nothing to really do with it until the BE shop rolls around again. But I have a solution! What if you could reroll a champion shard for a skin shard for that champion. Let's say you have a Jax shard, and you like playing Jax, and you didn't have much cash right now to just buy a skin, or you wanted a legacy skin. Reroll the Jax shard for a skin shard for Jax, and if you don't own it yet, just activate it with orange essence!
